Elements.Name: DisplayMode
Description: Display mode of the game window.

Elements.Name: AllowResizeInWindowed
Description: Allows the game window to be resized in windowed mode.

Elements.Name: UseConfigWorkaround
Description: Uses a workaround for fixing the infamous configuration mismatch error when using this mod.
If you are getting it, try enabling this.
Please note that it's not guaranteed to work correctly.

Elements.Name: EnableHdrOutput
Description: The game was not optimized for HDR, so the result is heavily subjective, hence the experimental tag.
- You need a GPU capable of outputting 10-bit colors.
- The game needs to be in exclusive fullscreen.
If you don't meet any of the conditions above, you might get "Graphics Device Unsupported" error or not see any difference.
